casebody.data:
Monday, April 27, 1992

MOTION DOCKET

91-1351. State v. Schaim.

Hamilton County, No. C-900011. This cause is pending before

the court as an appeal and cross-appeal from the Court of Appeals for Hamilton County. Upon consideration of appellant/cross-appellee’s motion for leave to attend a seminar/meeting out of state,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that said motion be, and the same is hereby, denied.

H. Brown, J., dissents.
